H1.text: who wrote the song always be humble and kind. Keith Urban

H2.text: who wrote the song always be humble and kind. Carrie Underwood

H3.text: who wrote the song always be humble and kind. Lori McKenna

A4.text: The Grammy for Best Country Song in 2016 was awarded to 'Humble and Kind' which was written by McKenna and recorded by Tim McGraw.

A5.text: In 2017, she again won Best Country Song at the 59th Annual Grammy Awards for writing 'Humble and Kind' performed by Tim McGraw.
